title: Palo Alto Networks security advisory (AV25-414)
description: On July 9, 2025, Palo Alto Networks published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following:
products: Autonomous Digital Experience Manager 5.6.0 macOS  versions prior to 5.6.7
GlobalProtect App 6.3 macOS  versions prior to 6.3.3-h1 (6.3.3-c650)
GlobalProtect App 6.2 macOS  versions prior to 6.2.8-h2 (6.2.8-c243)
GlobalProtect App 6.2 Linux  versions prior to 6.2.8
Prisma Access Browser  versions prior to 137.16.6.120
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
